OK. Just to the point. u tried to install Step 7 on Windows 7. And the conclusion is u can’t install. Step 7 5.4 SP5 only supports Windows XP with SP2 or SP3, 

But don’t worry. Microsoft already equipped Windows 7 with Windows XP Mode  and Windows Virtual PC. They make all Windows XP application possible to run in Windows 7. That's means all Simatic software can also work in “Windows 7″.  show me yr magic now ~_^.
